ingredients.ingredient: 1 (10.75 ounce) can condensed cream of mushroom soup
2 slices processed cheese food (such as Velveeta®)
½ cup crushed potato chips, or as needed

cookingTips: Cook noodles slightly underdone as they will continue cooking in the oven
Mix sauce ingredients and tuna gently to keep tuna chunks intact
Add potato chip topping in the last few minutes of baking to keep it crispy
enrichment.coachingPrompt: How can I modernize this classic casserole while keeping its comforting, nostalgic character?
